doc.name: newTool
doc.summary: Sent to the caller of choose when a different tool is chosen.

examples.example:
on newTool newTool
if newTool is "Browse" then show stack "Editing Tools"
else hide stack "Editing Tools"
end newTool

description.overview: Sent when the choose command is used to change the current tool.

parameters.parameter: The toolName is the name of the tool that has just been chosen.

description.comments:
The newTool message is sent to the object owning the script that executed the choose command.
To detect when the user changes tool using the Tools palette in the IDE, handle the message in a frontscript.
